column6:
The treacherous Victor Von Doom's fantastic, fearsome foursome have at last maneuvered Magneto into the one place he is vulnerable, and it is time for Doom to strike. But, for all his elaborate planning, is there anything-or anyone-Doom has overlooked? And how much will that oversight cost him? Don't miss the exciting, action-packed finale!,2005,9

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column7: | Doctor Doom | Fantastic Four | Human Torch | Magneto (House of M)
column8: | penciller (cover):Scot Eaton | writer:John Layman | inker:Rick Magyar | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Dean White
